sentences.en: Giles Gosling himself was somewhat scandalized at the obstreperous nature of their mirth.
sentences.cn: 吉尔斯·戈斯林本人看到大家高兴起来那么喧哗,有点难为情.

sentences.en: He becomes obstreperous when he's had a few drinks.
sentences.cn: 他喝了些酒就爱撒酒疯.

sentences.en: In the class that day was an obstreperous man who was creating turmoil.
sentences.cn: 那天教室里有个任性的男人在捣乱.

sentences.en: You know I have no intention of being awkward and obstreperous.
sentences.cn: 你知道我无意存心作对。

words.tran_cn: 吵闹的，喧嚣的；难驾驭的

trans.tran_cn: 喧嚣的，喧闹的，不服约束的
trans.tran_en: noisy and refusing to do what someone asks
